titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House and Senate until April 11, 1988.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/30/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives and the Senate from March 31, 1988, until April 11, 1988.
